snippet: The Toronto Blue Jays activated Edwin Encarnacion from the 15-day disabled list and sent outfielder Anthony Gose to the minors on Friday before their game at the Chicago White Sox.
abstract: MLB Roundup; Atlanta Braves beat Oakland Athletics, 7-2; other baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Toronto Blue Jays activated Edwin Encarnacion from the 15-day disabled list and sent outfielder Anthony Gose to the minors on Friday before their game at the Chicago White Sox.

headline.main: Four Homers Lift Braves Over Athletics
headline.print_headline: Four Homers Lift Braves Over Athletics
